q_ep_start.text: (You find {npc:321} in prayerful solitude in the Black Cathedral. He raises a stern gaze at you.)\nHow may I serve you, my child? Speak quickly, I am busy serving the Almighty.

options.text: Father, I am looking for item {item:268}. They say you have it.
My apologies, I won't disturb you.

q_ep_ask_scroll.text: The ancient scroll? (Frowns) Are you talking about the relic {item:268}? It is indeed under my care. And why would I discuss it with you?

options.text: This {item:268} is very important for a certain matter. May I obtain it?

q_ep_priest_refuse_initial.text: Obtain it? This holy relic? (Shakes his head) Out of the question. It is not for prying eyes, let alone for being handed over. It is the church's property.

options.text: I am willing to pay for it. Generously.
(Lie) This {item:268} is needed to save an innocent life!
Perhaps you misunderstood. I NEED it.
I see. Sorry to bother you.

q_ep_bribe_attempt.text: My relics are not for sale, child. Your money won't help here. I have a duty to my faith.

options.text: Then I'll have to take it by force.
I understand. I won't insist further.

q_ep_persuade_lie_works.text: (The priest looks at you for a long time, then sighs heavily.)\nSaving a life... If that's true, then it is my duty to help. Very well. I will give you {item:268}. But use it wisely and not for evil.

options.text: Thank you, Father! Your kindness will be rewarded.

q_ep_give_scroll.text: (The priest reluctantly hands you {item:268}.)\nMay the Almighty keep you on the righteous path.

q_ep_threaten_attempt.text: By force? In a holy place? ({npc:321}'s eyes flash with anger) You are committing terrible blasphemy! I will not allow this! Guards!

options.text: (The guards who rushed in seize you)

q_ep_arrested_text.text: {npc:321}: The guards are already here! For blasphemy in this holy place, you will spend the next day behind bars reflecting on your behavior! Take him away!
